listen you can talk about war you can

you can show a cat video or you can show

videos will be subject to the rule of

flagger
program in which 15 expert NGOs and

and it looks like what they're going to

they'll never let anyone see them they

they will be placed in a limited state
the videos remain on YouTube behind of

Obamacare
they're saying the rates are going up

thank God we've been following this all

look at this because what he did in
Congress and what happened here and he's

now rates are going up well no coops
have been going bankrupt half of them

we've seen premiums soar since Obama

maybe that would have been the right

you are presenting an unacceptable
